channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- openstack-heat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- openstack-heat

item.title: CVE-2017-2621|2024-08-05T14:02:06.948Z -- red%20hat -- openstack-heat
item.description: An access-control flaw was found in the OpenStack Orchestration (heat) service before 8.0.0, 6.1.0 and 7.0.2 where a service log directory was improperly made world readable. A malicious system user could exploit this flaw to access sensitive information.
